thread.title: Industrial Lithium Battery Innovator Flux Power to Present at Singular Research 10th Annual Best of the Uncovereds Conference on Thursday, September 17 at 12:15 pm PDT in Los Angeles
thread.title_full: Industrial Lithium Battery Innovator Flux Power to Present at Singular Research 10th Annual Best of the Uncovereds Conference on Thursday, September 17 at 12:15 pm PDT in Los Angeles

author: stockhouse.com
title: Industrial Lithium Battery Innovator Flux Power to Present at Singular Research 10th Annual Best of the Uncovereds Conference on Thursday, September 17 at 12:15 pm PDT in Los Angeles
text:
LOS ANGELES and NOVI, Mich., Sept. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Flux Power Holdings, Inc. (OTCQB: FLUX), a developer of advanced lithium batteries for industrial applications announced today that CEO Ron Dutt will present at the 10 th Annual Best of the Uncovereds Investor Conference on September 17, 2015 at 12:15 pm PDT . The conference will be held at the LUXE Sunset Bel Air Hotel in Los Angeles , CA. The presentation from Flux will not be webcast.
In addition, Flux will exhibit its LiFT Pack™ line for electric forklifts at The Battery Show 2015 (booth #1823) , Tues., Sept. 15 – Thur., Sept. 17, 2015 . The convention is being held in conjunction with the Electric & Hybrid Vehicle Technology Expo at The Suburban Collection Showplace in Novi, Michigan .
Flux Power combines the benefits of lithium-ion with Flux's patented Battery Management System (BMS) and in-house engineering with product design culminating in new state-of-the-art batteries for a variety of industrial applications, including Class III "walkie" trucks and larger lift equipment. Flux expects to introduce additional applications for portable power, grid and stationary energy in the future.
Flux has built a nationwide network of battery distributors, forklift dealers, OEMs and large customers who recognize the performance and cost benefits of Flux's lithium-ion storage solutions. To date, Flux has forged relationships with 26 large U.S. customers, 16 of which have made initial LiFT Pack purchases following pilots and 10 of which are progressing in their pilots. Flux's growing base of large customers includes a diverse swath including those in the beverage, food, grocery, consumer goods, shipping and transportation verticals.
About The Battery Show 2015 ( www.thebatteryshow.com )
The Battery Show 2015 is the premier showcase of the latest advanced battery technology and America's biggest free-to-attend exhibition for advanced batteries.
About Flux Power Holdings, Inc. ( www.fluxpwr.com )
Flux Power develops and markets advanced lithium-ion energy storage systems ('batteries') based on its proprietary battery management system (BMS) and in-house engineering and product design.
Flux, Flux Power and associated logos are trademarks of Flux Power Holdings, Inc. All other third party brands, products, trademarks, or registered marks are the property of and used to identify the products or services of their respective owners.
